title: Ivanka vs. The Help, Vaccine Hookup 1.15.21
itunes:title: Ivanka vs. The Help, Vaccine Hookup 1.15.21
description:
In episode 792, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and activist Derrick Lemos to discuss the GOP's calls for unity, FAA putting people on the no fly list, Rudy Giuliani, how to get the covid vaccine in the U.S., the secret service being treated like the help, the right dressing up like Marvel characters, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The phony GOP calls for ‘unity’ deserve nothing but contempt
  2. FAA: No more warnings for unruly passengers on flights
  3. NEW on the widening rift between Trump and GOP leaders. After McCarthy told Trump and the Republican caucus antifa wasn't involved in last week's riots (which FBI confirmed), Rudy Giuliani told me McCarthy "doesn’t know what the hell he’s talking about."
  4. Trump is isolated and angry at aides for failing to defend him as he is impeached again
  5. The State Where ‘Connections’ Are King in Vaccine Hunt
  6. The $3,000-a-month toilet for the Ivanka Trump/Jared Kushner Secret Service detail
  7. Captain America creator’s son hits out at Capitol mob's use of superhero imagery
  8. Can Captain America serve two dramatically different versions of America?
  9. IT'S TIME FOR MARVEL TO RETIRE THE PUNISHER'S SKULL LOGO
  10. The Creator Of ‘The Punisher’ Wants To Reclaim The Iconic Skull From Police And Fringe Admirers
  11. Can Captain America serve two dramatically different versions of America?
  12. WATCH: All Night - Romare

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
